Ad Text:
Want to move beyond building features and start solving the fundamental problems at the frontier of AI?

Join a well-funded, proven AI-native startup with an exceptional founding team pushing the limits of technology. Backed by Australia's top VCs, they are building beautiful software that is resonating globally, with a multi-million dollar pipeline of incredible clients.

We're looking for a thought partner‚Äîa Product Engineer¬†who thrives on ambiguity, ownership and solving genuinely hard technical challenges.

What you'll be doing:

Responsible for taking ownership of business-critical problems‚Äîfrom architecting low-latency models to designing real-time pipelines.
Operating as a thought partner within the engineering team, contributing across the stack (Python, Javascript) and collaborating with product and design to define solutions.
Contribute to a product-led culture, pleasantly debating trade-offs and surrounding yourself with fun, supportive, brilliant people.
Working remotely with a remote-first team (who catch up in Aus / US when they like).
What you'll bring to the team:

A demonstrated track record of success within high-performing, product-led engineering organizations.
Ability to own projects and be self-directed, an autonomous problem-solver with a bias for action and communication.

What else is offered:

A highly competitive salary and significant equity package.
The opportunity to join a proven team and build a market-defining product with global demand.
A collaborative, high-density team culture.
Exposure to bleeding edge tech stack, AI and global challenges.
What's next:
